Name: NARCOTIC DRUGS AND PSYCHOTROPIC SUBSTANCES
Conclusion: Bangkok, 27 November 1931 and Lake Success, New York, 11 December 1946<superscript>1</superscript>
EIF: 27 October 1947, the date on which the amendments to the Agreement, as set forth in the annex to the Protocol of 11 December 1946, entered into force, in accordance with paragraph 2 of article VII of the Protocol.
